'''Yumemiru "Kuukai" Street Lamp''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Yumemiru "Kuukai" Street Lamp is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] on [[Tsurumi Island]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest south of the [[Teleport Waypoint]] in [[Shirikoro Peak]] at [[Oina Beach]] on Tsurumi Island.
<gallery>
Item Yumemiru Kuukai Street Lamp Location.png|Map location
Item Yumemiru Kuukai Street Lamp Context.png|Additional context
</gallery>

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=60}}.

|time = 14h
|Yumemiru Wood = 8
|Red Dye = 4
|sort = Yumemiru Wood;Red Dye
}}
